Articles.Content:
Hello! I have installed Prakasa aeroworks on KSP 1.2.2. The problem is when I try to ignite Chikna engine, it tells me air combustion failed. I think it might something missed in the .cfg file.

http://imgur.com/gallery/FhAeR

It might very well your engines are asking more air than your intakes can provide while standing still.
Ignite your engines in stages: First ignite one on each side and gain some momentum in order for your intakes to generate more air. Then light another pair, etc. etc.

9 hours ago, Kommodore said:

Hello! I have installed Prakasa aeroworks on KSP 1.2.2. The problem is when I try to ignite Chikna engine, it tells me air combustion failed. I think it might something missed in the .cfg file.

http://imgur.com/gallery/FhAeR

it's a scram jet, it will work only at high speed
